turkishSentence: Tren yarım saattir istasyondaydı.
englishSentence: The train at the station for half an hour.

turkishSentence: Güneş gözlüklerim dünden beri ofisteydi.
englishSentence: My sunglasses had been in the office since yesterday.

turkishSentence: Bu mağazadaki gömlekler iki gündür indirimdeydi.
englishSentence: The shirts in this store had been on sale for two days.

turkishSentence: Beş yıldan fazla bir süredir bu şirkette satış temsilcisiydi.
englishSentence: He had been a sales representative in this company for over five years.

turkishSentence: Geçen Pazartesi'den beri hava çok soğuktu.
englishSentence: It had been very cold since last Monday.

turkishSentence: Odanın anahtarı günlerdir kayıptı.
englishSentence: The key of the room has been lost for days.

turkishSentence: Bilgisayar şirketleri on yıldan fazla bir süredir New York taydı.
englishSentence: Their computer company had been in New York for more than ten years.

turkishSentence: Annem geçen haftadan beri benim için çok endişeliydi.
englishSentence: My mother had been worried about me a lot since last week.

turkishSentence: İtfaiye erleri on dakikadır yanan binanın önündeydiler.
englishSentence: Firefighters had been in front of the burning building for ten minutes.

turkishSentence: Ali, 2015ten beri bu şirkette düzenli çalışanlardan biriydi.
englishSentence: Ali had been one of the regular workers in that company since 2015.

turkishSentence: Bill yıllardır yavaş bir sporcuydu.
englishSentence: Bill had been a slow athlete for years.

turkishSentence: Bob son beş yıldır kötü bir oyuncuydu.
englishSentence: Bob had been a bad actor for last five years.

turkishSentence: George, emekli olmadan önce, 2002'den beri hızlı bir şofördü.
englishSentence: George had been a fast driver since 2002 before he retired.

turkishSentence: Hasan burada çalışmaya başlamadan önce, dört yıldır ciddi bir işçiydi.
englishSentence: Hasan had been a serious worker for four years before he started to work here.

turkishSentence: Bu yarıştan önce aylardır dikkatli bir sürücüydü.
englishSentence: He had been a careful driver for months before this race.

turkishSentence: Evlenmeden önce, yedi yıldır hızlı bir ressamdı.
englishSentence: He had been a fast painter for seven years before he married.

turkishSentence: İşi bırakmaya karar verdiğinde iyi bir öğretmendi.
englishSentence: He had been a good teacher by the time she decided to quit the job.

turkishSentence: Son romanına kadar yıllarca iyi bir yazardı.
englishSentence: He had been a good writer for years until his last novel.

turkishSentence: Mary yeni işinden önce dikkatsiz bir yazardı.
englishSentence: Mary had been a careless typist before her new job.

turkishSentence: Mehmet, kötü bir kaza geçirene kadar, dikkatli bir sürücüydü.
englishSentence: Mehmet had been a careful driver by the time he had a bad accident.

turkishSentence: Kardeşim sağ bacağını kırmadan önce, hızh bir koşucuydu.
englishSentence: My brother had been a fast runner before he broke his right leg.

turkishSentence: Annem hastalanana kadar, iyi bir aşçıydı.
englishSentence: My mother had been a good cook by the time she got sick.

turkishSentence: Peter bu şansı elde edene kadar, kötü bir oyuncuydu.
englishSentence: Peter had been a bad player until he got this chance.

turkishSentence: Hamile kalmadan önce, hızlı yüzücüydü.
englishSentence: She had been a fast swimmer before she got pregnant.

turkishSentence: Bölümünü değiştirmeden önce, kibar bir konuşmacıydı.
englishSentence: She had been a polite speaker before she changed her department.

turkishSentence: Neredeyse üç yıldır hızlı bir yazardı.
englishSentence: She had been a quick typist for almost three years.

turkishSentence: İkizler paralarını kaybedene kadar, çok çalışkanlardı.
englishSentence: The twins had been hard workers by the time they lost thier money.

turkishSentence: Şirketleri iflas etmeden önce, meşgul işçilerdi.
englishSentence: They had been busy workers before their company bankrupted.

turkishSentence: Baba olmadan önce, tehlikeli sürücüydüler.
englishSentence: They had been dangerous drivers before they became fathers.

turkishSentence: Bırakmaya karar verene kadar, altı yıldır ağır sigara içicilerdi.
englishSentence: They had been heavy smokers for six years until they decided to quit.

turkishSentence: Yöneticileri onları uyarmadan önce, sessiz işçilerdi.
englishSentence: They quiet workers before their manager wamed them.

turkishSentence: Onlar sonuçları açıklayana kadar, saatlerdir çok endişeliydik.
englishSentence: We had been very worried for hours by the time they explained the results.

turkishSentence: Zeynep pratik yapmadan önce, akıcı bir konuşmacı değildi.
englishSentence: Zeynep hadn 't been a fluent speaker before she practised.

turkishSentence: Son sınavda kötü bir not alana kadar, çok zeki bir öğrenciydi.
englishSentence: He had been a very intelligent student until he got a bad mark in the last exam.

turkishSentence: Kurallara uymadan önce, dikkatsiz bir işçiydi.
englishSentence: He had been a careless worker before he obeyed the rules.

turkishSentence: Bu sandalye, sen onu kırana kadar, son iki yıldır çok rahattı.
englishSentence: This chair had been very comfortable for last two years by the time you broke it.

turkishSentence: On beş yaşına kadar çok uzun değildi.
englishSentence: You hadn 't been not very tall before the age of fifteen.

turkishSentence: David, yeni öğretmeniyle tanışmadan önce, çok çalışkan bir öğrenci değildi.
englishSentence: David hadn't been very hardworking student before he met his new teacher.

turkishSentence: Kanepem son bir aydır pek rahat değildi.
englishSentence: My sofa hadn't been very comfortable for last one month.

turkishSentence: Planınız, siz öğrenmeden önce, pek iyi değildi.
englishSentence: Your plan hadn't been very good before you found out.

turkishSentence: Bu çiçekler, ben onlara bakana kadar, çok iyi değildi.
englishSentence: These flowers hadn 't been very nice until I took care of them.

turkishSentence: Sen bana yardım edene kadar, çantalarım çok ağırdı.
englishSentence: My bags had been very heavy by the time you helped me.

turkishSentence: Bu kursa başlamadan önce, sanata çok ilgili değildim.
englishSentence: I hadn't been very interested in art before I started this course.

turkishSentence: Hava, haftalardır çok sıcak değildi.
englishSentence: It hadn't been very warm for weeks.

turkishSentence: Bu domatesler yarım saattir tezgahın üzerindeydi.
englishSentence: These tomatoes had been on the counter for half an hour.

turkishSentence: Bu bıçak, ben onu keskinleştirmeden önce çok keskin değildi.
englishSentence: This knife hadn't been very sharp before I sharpened it.

turkishSentence: İnsanlar savaştan önce çok kibarlardı.
englishSentence: People had been very polite before the war.

turkishSentence: Yaklaşık beş yıldır aşçıydı.
englishSentence: She had been a cook for almost five years.

turkishSentence: Hava, üç gündür bulutluydu.
englishSentence: The weather had been cloudy for three days.

turkishSentence: Onlar, onu bir restorana dönüştürmeden önce, o yıllarca bir uçaktı.
englishSentence: It had been a plane for years before they transformed it to a restaurant.

turkishSentence: Onunla tanışmadan önce, önemli oyunculardan biriydi.
englishSentence: She had been one of the important players before he met her.

turkishSentence: İstanbul'a taşınmadan önce, 2014 yılından beri Antalya'daydılar.
englishSentence: They had been in Antalya since 2014 before they moved to Istanbul.

turkishSentence: Kardeşim arabayı çarpana kadar, araba yeniydi.
englishSentence: The car had been new by the time my brother crashed it.

turkishSentence: İşçiler, zili duymadan önce, yarım saattir fabrika dışındaydılar.
englishSentence: The workers had been outside the factory for half an hour before they heard the bell.

turkishSentence: Ben onu aramadan önce, trafik nedeniyle geç kaldı.
englishSentence: He had been late because of the traffic before I called him.

turkishSentence: Müdür öğrenciler uyarana kadar, onları tembellerdi.
englishSentence: The students had been lazy by the time the principal warned them.

turkishSentence: Çözmek için kolay bir yol bulana kadar, sorular zordu.
englishSentence: The questions had been difficult by the time they found an easy way to solve them.

turkishSentence: Son seçime kadar dört yıldır Başbakan'dı.
englishSentence: He had been the Prime Minister for four years until the last election.

turkishSentence: Onlar bize yardım edene kadar kötü bir durumdaydık.
englishSentence: We had been a bad situation until they helped us.

turkishSentence: Neredeyse beş gündür evdeydiler.
englishSentence: They had been at home for almost five days.

turkishSentence: Okulun basketbol takımına katılmadan önce, kısa boyluydu.
englishSentence: She short before he joined the school's basketball team.

turkishSentence: Kedi, ben onu dışarı çıkarana kadar, masanın altındaydı.
englishSentence: The cat had been under the table by the time I took him out.

turkishSentence: Kursu tamamlamadan önce, geçen Mart'tan beri Britanya'daydı.
englishSentence: He had been in Britain since last March before he completed his course.

turkishSentence: Kötü haberi duyana kadar bir haftadır mutluydular.
englishSentence: They had been happy for a week until they heard the bad news.

turkishSentence: Ameliyat olmadan önce, aylardır hastaydı.
englishSentence: He had been ill for months before he had an operation.

turkishSentence: Toplantı, onlar takvimi değiştirmeden önce, yıllardır Çarşamba günleriydi.
englishSentence: The meeting had been on Wednesdays for years before they changed the schedule.

turkishSentence: Federasyon bazı düzen [emeler yapmadan önce, futbol maçları saat ikideydi.
englishSentence: The football matches had been at two o'clocks before the federation made some arrangments.

turkishSentence: İngiltere'de yaşamaya başlayana kadar, beş yıldır Almanya'daydı.
englishSentence: He had been in Germany for five years by the time he started to live in England.

turkishSentence: Sözlük, yarım saattir masanın üstündeydi.
englishSentence: The dictionary had been on the desk for half an hour.

turkishSentence: Kapı, biri onu açana kadar, sabahtan beri kapalıydı.
englishSentence: The door had been closed since morning by the time somebody opened it.

turkishSentence: Büyükbabam, o restoranı satana kadar, yirmi yıldır o restoranın sahibiydi.
englishSentence: My grandfatherhad been the owner of that restaurant for twenty years until he sold it.

turkishSentence: Onlar, telefonu tamir etmeden önce, telefon neredeyse iki saattir bağlantısızdı.
englishSentence: The telephone had been disconnected for almost two hours before they fixed it.

turkishSentence: Onlar, tamirci çağırmadan önce, pencere günlerdir kırık değil miydi?
englishSentence: Had the window been broken for days before they called a mechanic?

turkishSentence: Onlar, onu uyandırdıklarında, 0 12 saattir yatakta mıydı?
englishSentence: Had he been in bed for 12 hours when they woke him up?

turkishSentence: Tren nihayet geldiğinde, 90 dakika istasyonda mıydılar?
englishSentence: Had they been at the station for 90 minutes when the train finally arrived?

turkishSentence: Yüzüğü banyoda bulduğumuzda, yüzük iki saattir kayıp mıydı?
englishSentence: Had her ring been lost for two hours when we found it in the bathroom?

turkishSentence: Aniden yağmur yağmaya başladığında, uzun zamandır parkta değil miydin?
englishSentence: Hadn't you been at park for a long time when it suddenly began to rain?

turkishSentence: Londra'ya gitmeden önce, ne kadar süredir İngilizce sınıfindaydı?
englishSentence: How long had she been in the English class before she went to London?

turkishSentence: Frank, doktoru onu tedavi edene kadar, günlerdir hastaydı.
englishSentence: Frank had been sick for days by the time his doctor treated him.

turkishSentence: Benzini bittiğinde bir saatten az bir süredir yolda değil miydi?
englishSentence: Hadn't he been on the way less than an hour when he ran out of petrol?

turkishSentence: Çocuklar yüzünden günlerdir çok yorgun değiller miydi?
englishSentence: Hadn't they been very tired for days because of the children?

turkishSentence: Ben onu almadan önce, iki saattir sinemadaydı.
englishSentence: He had been at the cinema for two hours before I picked him up.

turkishSentence: Yeni bir ev satın almadan önce, iki gündür çok gergindiler.
englishSentence: They had been very nervous for two days before they bought a new house.

turkishSentence: Tony gelmeden önce, onlar yarım saattir etkinlikteydiler.
englishSentence: They had been at the event for half an hour before Tony arrived.

turkishSentence: Onu kovduklarında, üç yıldır o şirketteydi.
englishSentence: She had been at that company for three years when they fired her.

turkishSentence: Otobüse binmek için ne kadar süredir otobüs durağındaydın?
englishSentence: How long had you been at the bus stop to get on the bus?

turkishSentence: Mike yirmi dakikadır kahve dükkanındaydı.
englishSentence: Mike had been at the cofee shop for twenty minutes.

turkishSentence: James, Asya'ya gitmeden önce, bir yıldan fazla bir süredir üniversitedeydi.
englishSentence: James had been at the university for more than a year before he left for Asia.

turkishSentence: Uykuya dalmadan önce, çok yorgundu.
englishSentence: He had been very tired before he fell asleep.

turkishSentence: Giysilerini çamaşır makinesine koymadan önce, çok kirliydi.
englishSentence: His clothes had been very dirty before he put them into washing machine.

turkishSentence: Sen onları aramadan önce, bir saattir düğün töreninde değiller miydi?
englishSentence: Hadn't they been at the wedding ceremony for an hour before you called them?

turkishSentence: Boşanmadan önce, ne kadar süredir evlilerdi?
englishSentence: How long had they been married before they divorced?

turkishSentence: İki buçuk yıldır gizli bir çalışmanın parçasıydı.
englishSentence: She had been part of a secret study for two and half years.

turkishSentence: Dükkandaki elektronik klavyeyi satmadan önce, toz içindeydi.
englishSentence: The electronic keyboard in the shop had been in dust before he sold it.

turkishSentence: Mario çok fazla pratik yapana kadar, mükemmel bir müzisyen değildi.
englishSentence: Mario hadn't been an excellent musician until he practised a lot.

turkishSentence: Bestecilik yapmaya başlamadan önce, üç yıldır piyano sınıfındaydı.
englishSentence: He had been at the piano class for three years before he started composin music.

turkishSentence: Yakın arkadaşın, karısı onunla konuşmadan önce, bir saattir stadyumda mıydı?
englishSentence: Had your close friend been at the stadium for an hour before her wife talked to him?

turkishSentence: Rengini siyaha değiştirene kadar, evin duvarlarının rengi beyazdı.
englishSentence: The color of walls of the house had been white until we changed its color black.

turkishSentence: Ben onu rahatlatmadan önce, dakikalardır çok stresliydi.
englishSentence: He had been very stressful for minutes before I relieved him.

turkishSentence: Ebeveynlerin seni aramadan önce, sen saatlerdir onlarla mıydın?
englishSentence: Had you been with them for hours before your parents looked for you?
